meanings.definition: A tropical plant with long, sword-shaped leaves.
meanings.sent1: The dracaena in the corner of the room adds a touch of green to the space.
meanings.sent2: I watered the dracaena in the morning to keep it healthy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the dracaena, thinking it was a tree.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back like the long leaves of a dracaena.
meanings.sent5: The dracaena swayed gently in the breeze, its leaves shimmering in the sunlight.
